name: Itemwise Availability
query:
select 
tb.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:300", 
sum(tb.actual_qty) as "Available:Float:120", 
sum(qty)  as "Booked:Float:120" 
from `tabBin` as tb
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as sit 
ON sit.item_code = tb.item_code
and sit.parent = (select name from `tabSales Invoice` where docstatus = 1 and posting_date=%(as_on_date)s)
group by tb.item_code
